title: ICYMI: Unwrapping TikTok's Advent Calendar Drama
description:
On today’s episode, Madison and Rachelle examine two strange new phenomena taking over TikTok. First, Madison explains why Chanel’s advent calendars have become the subject of an internet furor. Then, Rachelle explores Hinge’s new voice notes feature, discusses the voice notes that have gone viral on other platforms, and explains why this not have been the dating app’s brightest idea.
Podcast production by Daniel Schroeder and Derek John.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
